review: a faithful beautiful wellcrafted recreation of the iconic 90s game  be prepared for some differences made to improve quality of life over the original as well as some new surprises  as an avid player of the myst franchise i am happy to have this new version of riven to explore
masterpiece
great remake of a masterpiece riven is the best chapter of the myst saga and the devs have done an amazing work strongly recommended for every myst fan
hard as hell but worth it
an excellent game that tested my intelligence 5 stars play this
beautiful homage to the original along with new puzzles an heavily immersive experience with even vr support to go even deeper into the strange land of riven  absolutly worth it
i want gehn old man yaoi
while it lacks the original fmvs its still a faithful recreation of the original
puzzles are good as are the visuals at least on the maximum settings occasionally i have had to seek help from a walkthrough but not too often

much better puzzle design and world building than myst some tedium having to retraverse puzzles and sections youve already beaten this is especially prominent towards the end of the game but overall this holds up extremely well for a game originally released in 1997 absolutely love the graphical overhaul

this was a fun game series from my childhood but i didnt beat myst until very recently returning older and wiser it was a genuine treat to play and complete the second game if you like puzzles ciphers and generally beautiful scenery this game is great im looking forward to playing the next one

fun immersive puzzle game you can clearly see and feel the amount of work that has been put into it very well made and of high quality  if you like solving puzzles and exploration this game wont let you down the story can be a bit much to take in but isnt entirely necessary to just have fun solving puzzles  works great with controller as well
loved the revamp of this game and the refresh of puzzles a beautiful world that i can easily stay in for countless hours thank you for another awesome game
it is a great and hard very hard
the world expansion on this version feels like its always been there  somehow more right than the original thoroughly enjoyed this game
riven 2024 in my opinion is a huge upgrade from the original waited for a good sale then grabbed it

how a remake should be done hoping the other games in the series will get the same treatment would love a sound in background option not sure if its just how older games were but riven 1997 still plays audio when tabbed out this game like many others today mute when tabbed out but in the world of multiple monitors and people using 2nd screens to take notes on games like this instead of an actual notepad tabbing out a lot is common
gorgeous remake like walking through a living 4k wallpaper of some volcanic islands and trying to figure who lived there and whats going on with the place

i have played the game multiple times and it is always is enjoyable  i am not skilled with games but with the help of walkthroughs i can always get to different parts of the game without becoming frustrated  the game runs smooth and beautiful on a macbook pro m3
the rare example of a classic adventure game improved with a thoughtful redesign
brilliant graphics are amazing  puzzles are complex
feels like original with the level of realtime 3d immersion i always wanted
play myst and riven when they came when i was a kid  the vr versions of these two games are an absolute blast  much better than the originals riven vr and myst  vr are a must try
minor changes to the classic but has preserved the heart of the game and made it look glorious

i never played the original riven from 1997 but i can absolutely say that its an absolutely gorgeous game which had me totally immersed in the age of riven  if youre looking at this review to help you decide whether or not you buy this game take note of everything trust me the only problem is that darn rotating room now i wonder if cyan will remake myst 3
great classic puzzle game remastered beautifully
awesome one of my favorite vr experiences such a cool world to explore and puzzle out  no suprise this company has endured for so long with the imaginative product they put out

i enjoyed the old riven this one is as good as before with slight adjustment in puzzles and great immersive graphics there is stills rooms to improve such as quick notepad access and skipping animations

an excellent reimagination of a timeless classic it stays true to the original yet feels modern and polished  and contains some new and interesting additions one of the best remakes i have seen so far highly recommended
really nice revision of riven my favorite game

great recreation the 3d adaptation was done with a lot of love and strikes the perfect balance of taking you back and making the game fresh and accessible for modern platforms only major distraction is the fact that the character animation is somehow much worse than the video capture from multiple decades ago
i enjoyed myst but this is just frustratingly difficult
original was great but this is awesome
i think i might be too dumb to replay this
good god these puzzles are mean
very good
very nice remaster of the original beautiful graphics  sometimes puzzles are hard to operate with the mousetrackball

fantastic remake i played the original when it came out 97 this remake is what i expected out of the original being able to walk around in this wonderful world of riven really love the puzzles that require environment navigation and logic highly recommend to anyone who likes unique world building atmosphere and story telling

thumbs up for the memories of the original but honestly i didnt enjoy this one i appreciate the new puzzles and the attempt at fast travel which is actually an annoying loading screen but this time it felt tedious i even fell asleep while going for an achievement if i hadnt played the original this one would probably get a thumbs down played it 2d i dont know about 3d
no killing in this game and you cant die or get stuck to where you have to start over

i had to return it because they changed too much from the original i was hoping for a remaster of the original with some nicer graphics and a more immersive world but they changed the puzzles from what i saw typically made them easier and even the mappaths sure it looks nice but i bought it to play riven not somebodys idea of what riven should have been
this game is awesome in vr i repeat awesome in vr you must play it in this mode

absolute classic brought to the modern age or is it the fifth age   absolutely love this reimagining of riven its got all the great stuff and a bit more than you remember  i hope we see more like this out of cyan because its been a really really long time coming  ive been critical of them over the years but this this is good 1010 no notes
will not openconstant crashes
nice graphics  good puzzles
i love games like these  did not play the original and i havent finished it yet  it is a whole world to learn your way around with some quite tough puzzles to solve
fantastic remake

100 recommend this game a lot of puzzle games arent hard enough or they hold your hand the whole time or theres too much talking this ones perfect you actually need to think things through and take notes thats what i love amazing game also didnt need to peek a walk through so you should be able to complete it on your own i did save the game near the ending because that was a bit tricky to get the ending i wanted so yeah save the game nearing the end would be my advice

the game is beautiful if you just want a walk simulator you can buy it just to walk around because there are very beautiful locations some puzzles were reworked so they are more intuitive and i didnt needed to look at any guide to get the best ending and the bad ones only looked at a guide to see some of the achievements i missed
28 years older and i still needed to look up hints
a love letter to riven players back in day
it looks amazing and totally pulled me in super nostalgic too if you were into the original youll love this one definitely check it out highly recommend
beautifully done nostalgic fun
phenomenal remake of a stone cold masterpiece
simply glorious i am so bad at it though

what a treat to revisit this awesome sequel to the equally awesome myst playing myst and riven in vr dials the experience up to 11 highly recommended works perfectly on my hp reverb g2 after following the simple instructions in the wmr stutteringjitteringblinking fix post
nostalgic and still interesting
a challenge no doubt but quite pleasant way to kill a few hours
a wonderful rebuild of a favorite
great game
remastered but some things changed  be prepared to have to find a new walk through because if you have notes from the original  like i did they will be utterly useless love the graphics

take an already incredible game myst and expanding its lore while changing the gameplay loop so that instead of distinct ages you instead have interconnected islands allowing a more fleshed and connected story to present itself everything from the details of why certain animals live there are incredibly important without being mandatory to realize to finish the story   it is excellent
a perfect remake
a new masterpiece of a masterpiece crying

an absolutely masterful remake and quite possibly one of the prettiest games ive ever seen regardless of if youve had the pleasure of playing riven the sequel to myst before or if this is your first time do not do yourself the disservice of skipping this title excellent work cyan

i dont know how cyan did it but they took the greatest puzzle adventure of all time and made it even better while i do miss the old slightly silly full motion video acting everything else has been sanded and polished to perfection making the annoying parts of the original game finally make sense play it with a good pair of headphones to really appreciate the sound design which is some of the best ive ever experienced in a game
one of the best games i have ever played a work of art
riven is the most mysterious and beautifully haunting game i have ever played its also extremely challenging it was my first pc game ever and it is just as magical as it was decades ago
this game has been a dream come true for me 3

played riven back in the day with my dad was excited to play it again and usually remakes can feel a bit stale not this one i wont spoil as its best to go in blind but i did enjoy going back into the world does it have flaws of course but so did all the originals i hope for a remaster of exile as well
breathtaking
loved it great throwback to the classic im a cheapskate but it was well worth the money
its fun
its not only an absolute classic but also a reinvention that lets you feel playing the game again for the first time awesome experience
such a great upgrade exactly what i was looking for all the atmosphere of the original and with beautiful visuals

breathtaking experience in vr this game seemed impossible as a kid 13 year old me would never have guessed that id beat the game while actually being in those worlds  if you like puzzle games you probably already own this but buy it again this version is wonderful
looks lovely but the gameplay is from a bygone era when obtuse puzzles and design choices that deliberately slow you down were made to disguise a lack of content
no one i have found creates this type of game and experience like cyan they are simply the best at what they do
much better than i remembered only downside is a lot of crashes on mac when doing screenshots

a wonderful update to a classic puzzle adventure game really brings riven alive being able to interact in a fully rendered enviroment puzzles have been updated in my opinion for the better but it has made things a touch easier
so amazing
a beautiful puzzle game that feels just like the 1997 prerendered ray traced graphics of the original

this was a very beautiful remake of riven it is nice to see the world in stunning 3d compared to what was available in 1997 the major puzzles are new and fresh giving you a reason to explore the world if you already played the original riven is my favorite of the myst series and i thoroughly enjoyed this game
very good remake new puzzles some new parts of mapvisuals are excellent need good pc for this

an excellent remake of one of my favorite games of all time i still think i prefer the original overall but this was a really great time as someone who adores the original game i think i could easily recommend this to people who havent played the original
i wanna give this a thumbs up i really do but so far the word puzzle is a stretch  its more like find the small thing in a huge area  once i realized that i got along pretty quick

it may have being a good puzzle game in the 2000 but in this day and age these puzzle are either simple or simply overcomplicated after a certain point i just couldnt force myself to do other 4 hours of running and watching animations just to get one or two puzzles inbetween  ps yet another unreal engine slop which cant run smoothly on lowest settings even on a pretty good pc constant stutters in a puzzle game is beyond me
masterpiece
i loved river it is one of my favorite cyan games  beautiful graphic challenging but not impossible to figure out and fun to play  i hope they are making another game like this
loved it

i played the original riven back then and i feared the puzzle would be too similar and simply babyish in some way they are indeed a bit easier but maybe because of my prior experience that said i truly enjoyed the new addition to the remake truly recommend for those loving puzzle

ive just started but wow i fell in love with riven playing on our g3 mac when i was young and this is incredible i wondered whether making the transition to fully 3d graphics would capture the same detail and beauty of the original but those concerns have been allayed this is so well done such a joy to be able to move around this beautiful world freely i might finally pull the trigger on a vr headset to get the full experience just because of this game
great game great puzzles  sometimes even a bit hard for casual playing but there are great guides out there
great remake of a great game i enjoyed
great game i prefer the first one but still a good one
i hate how dumb this game makes me feel but it has a nice atmosphere and plenty of satisfying exploration and secrets good remaster worth replaying pick it up on sale

a bit more obtuse than myst in some places but overall a good experience

totally worth it  especially but not only for fans of the franchise
